pages.title: Kamen Rider Zero-Three
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Outsiders (2022, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/hiden_zero_three_driver)Hiden Zero-Three Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch IX$(li)Strength XII (with empty hand)$(li)Strength VI (with weapon)$(li)Speed VII$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste V$(li)Jump Boost VII$(li)Fire Resistance
